node.name: Gendoc2
node.shortdescription:
TOPCASED Gendoc2 is an innovative solution to generate documents from EMF models, compatible with OpenOffice (.odt) and Office 2007(.docx) documents,
available on the following update site :
http://topcased-gendoc.gforge.enseeiht.fr/releases/1.7.0/

Tutorial at : http://gforge.enseeiht.fr/docman/view.php/102/4797/TPC_GenDoc2_v1.7.0_tu...

For example, you can generate completely your Specification document from your UML models.

Inside a .docx or .odt document template, you can :
* reference your EMF models
* write static parts
* write M2T Acceleo scripts for dynamic parts directly inside your template
(For advanced usage, you can create your custom Acceleo services and reference them inside external bundles)
* use styles inside your scripts parts that will be kept after generation

Inside your generated document, the scripts are replaced by model content, and can contain :
* formatted text
* images
* tables
* rich text content ( add specific Rich text feature)

The generation can be launched in Batch mode (add batch mode feature)

You can also use gendoc2 with TOPCASED models, GMF models, EPF models, PAPYRUS Models.

For more information on Gendoc2, have a look at : http://eclipseatos.blogspot.com/search/label/Gendoc2

Flash presentations are available at :
http://gforge.enseeiht.fr/docman/view.php/102/3893/tutorial1.zip
http://gforge.enseeiht.fr/docman/view.php/102/3894/tutorial2.zip
http://gforge.enseeiht.fr/docman/view.php/102/3895/tutorial3.zip
node.body:

Inside a .docx or .odt document template, you can :
* reference your EMF models
* write static parts
* write M2T Acceleo scripts for dynamic parts directly inside your template
(For advanced usage, you can create your custom Acceleo services and reference them inside external bundles)
* use styles inside your scripts parts that will be kept after generation

Inside your generated document, the scripts are replaced by model content, and can contain :

* images
* tables
* rich text content ( add specific Rich text feature)

The generation can be launched in Batch mode (add batch mode feature)
